# Implementation Report: Update Build Scripts for FBFSVGPlayer Rename
Generated: 2026-01-25T12:37:00

## Task
Update all build scripts to reflect the rename from SVGPlayer to FBFSVGPlayer.

## Changes Made

### 1. scripts/build-ios-framework.sh
- Changed `SDK_NAME="SVGPlayer"` to `SDK_NAME="FBFSVGPlayer"`
- Changed `IOS_SDK_DIR="ios-sdk/SVGPlayer"` to `IOS_SDK_DIR="ios-sdk/FBFSVGPlayer"`
- Updated output path references from `SVGPlayer.xcframework` to `FBFSVGPlayer.xcframework`
- Updated Obj-C source file references to use `FBFSVGPlayer*.mm` names
- Updated public header references to use `FBFSVGPlayer*.h` names
- Updated usage examples to `import FBFSVGPlayer` and `#import <FBFSVGPlayer/FBFSVGPlayer.h>`

### 2. scripts/build-linux-sdk.sh
- Changed `SDK_DIR="linux-sdk/SVGPlayer"` to `SDK_DIR="linux-sdk/FBFSVGPlayer"`
- Changed output library from `libsvgplayer.so` to `libfbfsvgplayer.so`
- Changed source files from `svg_player.cpp/.h` to `fbfsvg_player.cpp/.h`
- Changed version script from `libsvgplayer.map` to `libfbfsvgplayer.map`
- Changed pkg-config file from `svgplayer.pc` to `fbfsvgplayer.pc`
- Updated all symlinks and installation instructions

### 3. scripts/build-all.sh
- Updated iOS output path reference from `SVGPlayer.xcframework` to `FBFSVGPlayer.xcframework`
- Updated Linux output path reference from `libsvgplayer.so` to `libfbfsvgplayer.so`

### 4. scripts/test-all.sh
- Updated iOS XCFramework path from `SVGPlayer.xcframework` to `FBFSVGPlayer.xcframework`
- Updated Linux library path from `libsvgplayer.so` to `libfbfsvgplayer.so`
- Updated Docker test commands to check for `libfbfsvgplayer.so`

### 5. scripts/run-tests-ios.sh
- Updated header comments to reference FBFSVGPlayer
- Updated XCTest scheme references from `SVGPlayerTests` to `FBFSVGPlayerTests`
- Updated test target path from `ios-sdk/SVGPlayerTests` to `ios-sdk/FBFSVGPlayerTests`

### 6. scripts/run-tests-windows.sh
- Updated header comments to reference FBFSVGPlayer
- Updated implementation notes to reference `windows-sdk/FBFSVGPlayer`

### 7. Makefile
- Updated iOS output reference from `SVGPlayer.xcframework` to `FBFSVGPlayer.xcframework`
- Updated Linux SDK output reference from `libsvgplayer.so` to `libfbfsvgplayer.so`
- Updated help text for `linux-sdk` and `ios-framework` targets

## Files Modified
- `/Users/emanuelesabetta/Code/SKIA-BUILD-ARM64/scripts/build-ios-framework.sh`
- `/Users/emanuelesabetta/Code/SKIA-BUILD-ARM64/scripts/build-linux-sdk.sh`
- `/Users/emanuelesabetta/Code/SKIA-BUILD-ARM64/scripts/build-all.sh`

- `/Users/emanuelesabetta/Code/SKIA-BUILD-ARM64/scripts/run-tests-ios.sh`
- `/Users/emanuelesabetta/Code/SKIA-BUILD-ARM64/scripts/run-tests-windows.sh`
- `/Users/emanuelesabetta/Code/SKIA-BUILD-ARM64/Makefile`

## Notes
- The Python scripts (`svg_player_controller.py`, `cross_platform_test.py`) use `SVGPlayerController` as internal class names - these remain unchanged as they are API implementations, not product branding
- The C API function names like `SVGPlayer_Create` remain unchanged as they are part of the stable API
- The `scripts/build-macos-arch.sh` already correctly references `macos-sdk/FBFSVGPlayer/entitlements.plist`
- All SDK directories (`ios-sdk/FBFSVGPlayer`, `linux-sdk/FBFSVGPlayer`, `macos-sdk/FBFSVGPlayer`) were already renamed prior to this task
